CustomField.inlineHelpText: Financial guidance must be available in the event of important transitions, such as before starting a new job/education, or in the event of changes in working hours, salary or study load. What concerns do you have, do you need support and help before making a decision? If necessary, refer to a supervisor. NOTE! Information about the participant's affiliation with municipal services must not be recorded.
CustomField.label: Financial framework for imp. transition
